answers.answer: It is an external document that prevents naming collisions.
It is a list of the names of all developers that worked on that file.
It is a prefix used to prevent naming collisions.
It is a section within the XML document where you list your name.

question.theQuestion: How do you validate an XML document?

answers.answer: Google your entire document, the search engine will tell you if it is isCorrect.
If you believe in a higher power, ask them to look it over.
Use the W3X Online XML Validator.
